ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Redshifted photoelectric absorption with variable abundances. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A redshifted photoelectric absorption using Balucinska-Church and McCammon (ApJ 400, 699) cross-sections. The relative abundances are set by the set_xsabund command. This model is identical to xszvarabs except for the way that the parameters are defined.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: equivalent hydrogen column (in units of 10^22 atoms/cm^2)
equivalent columns for He, C, N, O, Ne, Na, Mg, Al, Si, S, Cl, Ar, Ca, Cr, Fe, Co, Ni

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
